name: CXSetGroupCallAction
desc: An encapsulation of the act of grouping or ungrouping calls.

items.name: init(call: UUID, callUUIDToGroupWith: UUID?)
items.desc: Initializes a new action for a call identified by a given UUID, as well as a call to group with identified by another UUID.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a new action to group calls with data in an unarchiver.

items.name: var callUUIDToGroupWith: UUID?
items.desc: The unique identifier of the call to be grouped with the call associated with the receiver.
